cu.explanation_en: Setting sst to 999 (exceeds maximum allowed value of 255) will cause PLMN configuration errors and prevent cell identification.

du.explanation_en: Setting preambleReceivedTargetPower to 100 (exceeds maximum allowed power level) will cause configuration validation failure and prevent PRACH setup.
du.explanation_zh: 將 preambleReceivedTargetPower 設定為 100（超過最大允許功率水平）會導致配置驗證失敗，並阻止 PRACH 設定。
